subject: Simsonn Pro x racing pedal disconnect status
description_text:
Hi Service,

My original order is sn1336 from 14 apr 2025

My pedal moved to the status of "Disconnect" two days ago, I disconnected
the USB from Hub and connected directly to the computer via USB3, restarted
the Simsson software and upgraded to version 2.1.0 but still the status is
the same. I also connected the BOX with a wire of ground to the frame of
the simulator base but the results are the same

I suddenly can't use the pedals.....why??

Please help,

Thanks,
Eitan lael

conversations.body_text: Hi EITAN LAEL,    Please try manually updating the pedal firmware:    Press the upgrade button on the main controller board, then reconnect the USB cable.    The SIMSONN Manager 2.1.0 software will automatically enter recovery mode.    In the software, go to Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → pedals → firmware-prox.sfu to update.    After the update is complete, test the pedals again.    If the issue still persists, please download ToDesk (no registration required), provide us with the temporary ID and password, and we can schedule a time to remotely assist you in resolving the problem.

Thanks, It works

Eitan
